category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Search_Filter_Values_Sort_Order
preference.preference_description: Specifies if the search filters are to be sorted by count or in a lexicographical order. If the value is TRUE, the filters are sorted by count. If the value is FALSE, the filters are sorted in a lexicographical order. Out of the box, the value is TRUE which implies the filters are sorted by count.
